caption.p: Average daily pan evaporation of Dachaidan, Dulan, Gangcha, Golmud, Xining, Yushu, and Lhasa from June to August within 2004–2016 (no available data of Yushu in 2006–2007 and 2015–2016). The evaporation was measured by evaporation tank. The black solid line is the trend line of the average values of average daily pan evaporation collected from the seven locations.
